posts.postText: Is there a way for us to just get materials without having to mine them? I like building stuff but it sucks so much when I run out of a material and have to go farm more for 5-10 minutes. And materials for visual appeal like stone you actually have to smelt which takes even longer. Looking back at what I just typed I think it kind of makes me look lazy but oh well.

This is aimed to be a hybrid between survival and creative server, thus items have to be farmed with. However, with /home, and beds there is very little risk in going farming, so, ummm, farm for your materials. My personal castle is build using more than 30 STACKS (30x64) of hand-smelted smoothstone. It's not that big a deal :)
You just need to put time in your buildings....
Please don't bump old threads: this thread is over 2 months old.
